name: LitMan Pubic Hair WIP
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 300976.29848.[/quote]

[b]Random Public Hair for Human NPC. Also to choose for Player on Character Creation.[/b]

[quote]DO NOT USE ON PRODUCTION SERVER OR SOLO.[/quote]

Female - 6 Styles.
Male - 3 Styles.

Mod respects Gameplay Nudity settings - None, Partial or Full. You need to set Gameplay Nudity settings accordingly.

Best used with "LitMan All Nude" or "LitMan Only Nude Women".

Support Discord Chanel: https://discord.gg/RjCVRWm

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you need a previous version it also could be found on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods/tree/master/Compiled
